entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
